name: Tic Tac Toe (itch) (Darrick2theend)
description:
Tic Tac Toe for Android programmed by Darrick Hilburn

Made for GAME 255 at Johnson County Community College

This Tic Tac Toe game features a single player mode and same device multiplayer mode

Sounds made through BFXR

Music:

Jaunty Gumption - Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
